channel.title: Easy question

item.title: Easy question
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

What’s wrong with the code? ik i cant use two “elses” so what would i change it to? thanks.

for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) { if(npcs[i].npcType == 3000){ if(misc.random(25)==0){ npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(1)==0){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Crush them underfoot!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "All glory to Bandos!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Break their bones!"; } } } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2009, 09:41:07 pm[/size][hr]ROFL guess its not so easy then?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 07:58:00 pm[/size][hr][quote=“hitman2009”]What’s wrong with the code? ik i cant use two “elses” so what would i change it to? thanks.

for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCSpawns; i++) { if(npcs[i].npcType == 3000){ if(misc.random(25)==0){ npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(1)==0){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Crush them underfoot!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "All glory to Bandos!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Break their bones!"; } } } [/quote]
Nobody knows?

Read full topic
